statements: DELETE FROM CuisineReport WHERE cuisine_id = 1 AND total_sales > 1000
DELETE FROM CuisineReport WHERE cuisine_name = 'Italian' AND (total_expenses < 500 OR profit > 200)
DELETE FROM Cuisines WHERE country = 'Italy' AND sales_data < 10000
DELETE FROM Reports WHERE profitability > 0.2 AND date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM CuisineExpenses WHERE year = 2022 AND labor_cost > 500;
DELETE FROM CuisineExpenses WHERE year = 2021 AND labor_cost > 5000;
DELETE FROM cuisine_locations WHERE location_name = 'Downtown' AND country = 'USA';
DELETE FROM cuisine_profit WHERE net_profit > 5000 AND profit_date < '2022-01-01'
